colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA BYED TSUL SPU GRI MIG ZHUR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS DANG 'BREL BA'I SLOB MA BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA DAD PA MI PHYED PA DANG LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA BRTZON 'GRUS DANG LDAN SMAN RAM PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB SOGS KYI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL LHO 'KHYAMS PA SKU SKYES BHU SU KU SU MA TI AARTHA SIDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA SO DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN 'GRUB BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
